docs.title: Bogota Design Language
docs.text: Bogota is the design language used for the Nobili software, which includes apps, the OS, etc. Bogota takes a modern approach to design.

docs.title: Platforms
docs.text:
• :material-cellphone-text: Design apps for Nobili - the home of Bogota
  • :material-web-plus: Use Bogota on the web and simplify your web UI
  • :material-android: Don't leave out Android! Use the Bogota stylesheet or Flutter
  • :material-apple: iOS? The only way to get Bogota on that is Flutter
